description.ruby-sapphire:
Powerful and sure to cause
confusion, but inaccurate.
description.emerald:
Powerful and sure to cause
confusion, but inaccurate.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is punched
with the user’s full
power. It confuses
the foe if it hits.

with the user’s full,
concentrated power.
It confuses the foe
if it hits.
